definitions.definition: Used to express anger , annoyance , or shock , or for emphasis .
definitions.label_groups: informal , Australia , British , India , Ireland , Newfoundland , New Zealand , South Africa , mildly vulgar

main_definition: ( informal , Australia , British , India , Ireland , Newfoundland , New Zealand , South Africa , mildly vulgar ) Used to express anger , annoyance , or shock , or for emphasis .
